Text.Page:
You don't look like a janitor, but you'll do, I suppose.

We do truly amazing work here, but one of the byproducts is a truly amazing mess. We need someone to clean this place up on a daily basis.

And yes, that's a hint. You catch on fast, .

I'm impressed. A lot of so-called heroes think they're too good for this sort of work.

I'll see you again tomorrow, I hope.
I can't even think with this place so messy. Clean it up now!
